site.description: A site is a spatial region bounded (in part or in whole) by material entities and may be occupied by material entities

siteNumber.description: A sequence of characters used to identify, name, or characterize the study site

date.description: Information about a calendar date or timestamp indicating day, month, year and time of an event

startDate.description: Information about a calendar date or timestamp indicating day, month, year and time of an event

endDate.description: Information about a calendar date or timestamp indicating day, month, year and time of an event

metaData.description: Data about data; information that describes another set of data

stationName.description: A name of a thing, which need not necessarily uniquely identify it

latitude.description: A measurement datum that is the measure of the latitude coordinate of a site

longitude.description: A measurement datum that is the measure of the longitude coordinate of a site

state.description: A political association with effective dominion over a geographic area

parameterCode.description: An identifier is a label that specifically refers to (identifies) an entity (instance/type)
